landing.title: Master new languages with smart vocabulary learning
landing.title-description: Build your own dictionaries, practice with spaced repetition, and track your progress as you learn new languages.

first.title: Personal Dicrionaries
first.description: Create custom dictionaries for any language pair and add words you want to learn.

second.title: Smart Practice
second.description: Practice with randomized words and track your progress with repetition-based learning.

third.title: Multi-Language Support
third.description: Learn multiple languages simultaneously with separate dictionaries for each.

fourth.title: Progress Tracking
fourth.description: Set repetition goals and watch words move from 'in progress' to 'learned' status.

fiveth.title: Flexible Learning
fiveth.description: Choose between native-to-target or target-to-native translation modes.

sixth.title: Word Management
sixth.description: Easily manage your vocabulary with options to relearn or remove words.

landing.motivation-description: Join thousands of language learners who are building their vocabulary with LexiLearn.
